nodes.text: A secret Separatist weapons factory was located on the planet of Diorda during the Clone Wars. Sometime during the war, the Hutt business owner Mondo-Mod came into possession of the weapons factory's coordinates. The Hutt later gave the Jedi Master Luminara Unduli the location of the weapons factory after the Jedi managed to defeat three of Mondo-Mod's best gladiators in the Arena of Doom.
